author: etnu
msg: Switched to using a ThreadLocal instead of a builder pool when threading is available. The pool was originally thought to be a better option, but in practice the total number of threads in a container remains fairly constant due to the use of thread pools on both executors and servlet containers.
The need for the reusability check may no longer be relevant since we now have a hard dependency on xerces 2.9, which supports reusable builders.

author: berndf
msg: [vysper] presence subscription workflow between two clients works now.

author: ngn
msg: Fix for bug where already started listeners would not be stopped if FtpServer.start() fails later (FTPSERVER-197)
